root_cause_candidates.description: Zigbee device lost connection to coordinator
evidence: No state updates in last 2 hours
Other Zigbee devices in same area are responsive

root_cause_candidates.description: Device power issue or battery depleted

recommended_fixes: 1. Check if device is powered on - toggle physical switch
2. Move device closer to Zigbee coordinator or router temporarily
3. Remove and re-add device in Zigbee2MQTT (last resort)
4. Check Zigbee2MQTT logs for connection errors
5. Verify Zigbee coordinator is functioning properly
